p: MR has recently been extended to molecular disease mechanisms using ‘summary-based MR’, which combines GWAS and gene expression data ( Zhu et al., 2016 ). This is the same as classical MR, except the exposure is the expression of a gene. Expression quantitative trait loci (QTL) are used, which are genetic variants associated with different expression levels of a gene. SNPs associated with gene methylation QTL or protein QTL levels can also be studied using this method.
